bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Edward S. Merritt, probably a veteran of the Civil and Indian Wars, was related by marriage to the Ord family, well known for its distinguished military service.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: This collection is organized into 4 volumes or scrapebooks

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Four scrapbooks of newspaper clippings relating chiefly to U.S. Army and Navy activities and personnel. Volume 4 also includes articles about Native Americans in Arizona and New Mexico.
